product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer Down Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket features 850-fill-power goose down for a highly compressible and incredibly lightweight layer that has no problem keeping you warm in the cold. Water- and wind-resistant ripstop nylon resists tearing while remaining ultra lightweight and comfortable against skin. 850-fill-power down has been treated with Q.Shield to resist moisture and retain maximum loft to keep you warm in damp conditions. Small quilted sections keep insulation in place and prevents formation of cold spots. Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket features 2 zippered front pockets; pocket doubles as stuff sack.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket features 850-fill-power goose down for a highly compressible and incredibly lightweight layer that has no problem keeping you warm in the cold.
